tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE plastic_pollution_in_oceans (
    agency_name STRING,
    report_date DATE,
    pollution_type STRING,
    pollution_amount INT
)

CREATE TABLE plastic_pollution_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_id INT,
    pollution_type VARCHAR(50),
    pollution_level INT,
    date_collected DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Ocean_Pollution_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name TEXT,
    pollution_level INT,
    location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Cleanup_Records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_id INT,
    cleanup_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES Ocean_Pollution_Data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Analysis_Results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    pollution_source TEXT,
    cleanup_success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE plastic_pollution_data (
	pollution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	pollution_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	pollution_level INT NOT NULL,
	location VARCHAR(100),
	agency_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES government_agencies(agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ocean_pollution_reports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	pollution_id INT,
	region_id INT,
	report_date DATE,
	report_description TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (pollution_id) REFERENCES plastic_pollution_data(pollution_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES ocean_regions(region_id)
);
